{{also|Legen}} ==Albanian== ===Etymology=== A formation from {{m|sq|lag}}. ===Noun=== {{sq-noun|m|legena|legeni|legenat}} # [[basin]], [[bucket]] # [[plowshare]] # the person who is first to [[take action]] # a new [[act]] or [[plan]] ====Related terms==== * {{l|sq|lag}} * {{l|sq|lëgatë}} * {{l|sq|laj}} ---- ==Danish== ===Noun=== {{head|da|noun form|g=c}} # {{inflection of|da|leg||def|s}} ---- ==Dutch== ===Pronunciation=== * {{audio|nl|Nl-legen.ogg|Audio}} * {{rhymes|nl|eːɣən}} * {{IPA|nl|/ˈleːɣə(n)/}} ===Verb=== {{nl-verb}} # to [[empty]] ====Inflection==== {{nl-conj-wk|leeg|lege}} ====Synonyms==== * {{l|nl|ledigen}} * {{l|nl|leegmaken}} * {{l|nl|lichten}} ===Anagrams=== * {{l|nl|engel}} ---- ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|legen}}, from {{inh|de|goh|leggen}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*lagjaną}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈleːɡŋ̩/|/ˈleːɡən/}} * {{audio|de|De-legen.ogg|audio}} * {{hyphenation|de|le|gen}} ===Verb=== {{de-verb-weak|legt|legte|gelegt}} {{+obj|de|acc}} # {{lb|de|transitive}} to [[lay]], to [[put]], to [[place]], to [[position]], so that it afterwands [[lie]]s as opposed to being {{m|de|setzen|gesetzt}}, {{m|de|stellen|gestellt}} #: {{ux|de|Leg deine Sachen auf den Stuhl!|Put your things on the chair!}} #: {{ux|de|Ich lege mich auf das Bett.|t=I lie down on the bed.}} #: {{ux|de|Eier legen|to lay eggs}} # {{lb|de|animal husbandry}} to [[castrate]] #: {{ux|de|Ich habe meinen Hengst legen lassen.|I let my stallion be castrated.}} #: {{syn|de|verschneiden|geilen|leichten|kastrieren|entmannen}} ====Conjugation==== {{de-conj-weak|leg|gelegt|h}} ====Derived terms==== {{der3|de|ablegen |anlegen |auflegen |auslegen |Bauernlegen |beilegen |belegen |darlegen |einlegen |erlegen |festlegen |flachlegen |fortlegen |freilegen |hereinlegen |hinlegen |Karten legen |krummlegen |Lege |Legebatterie |Legehenne |Legföhre |loslegen |nachlegen |niederlegen |offenlegen |querlegen |reinlegen |überlegen |umlegen |unterlegen |verlegen |vorlegen |weglegen |widerlegen |zerlegen |zulegen |zurücklegen }} ====See also==== * {{l|de|liegen}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:DWDS}} * {{R:Duden}} ---- ==Lubuagan Kalinga== ===Noun=== {{head|knb|noun}} #
